name: Monkey Runners FROM HELL
description:
(CONTROLS)

up/down arrows or w and s keys :)

monkey runners from hell (or MRFM) was a game made in 3 days for itch.io's score space game jam, it was made by:

bill barg - programming, spritework and music  

your_father: 3d models and general tomfoolery (you can check out his yt channel here: https://youtube.com/channel/UCfDCijh_DLuJGVinpBRocSg)

garfeild the undying (alex): 3d models, polish and absolute unit 

i really hope you enjoy the game as it was one of the first proper game jam games ive ever created :) - if there are any bugs or glitches please notify me so that i can fix them asap
